attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The expence of demolishing a village and over polluting an already filthy London,could be countered by Building in the middle base of our issolileas triangled Island homeland
A fast express service using axisting Railway foundations,could connect,London,via Heathrow within one hour-hour 15 .
The plain is bid enough to for the runway to miss Salisbury,Swindon and Stonehenge,and give fast connections to Wales,Southcoast,Birmingham and the north.
Besides,We dont have a big enough Army now to warrant the vast training areas D Bradley

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/HeathrowRunway3/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
